page.title: 19THORNTON LE MOOR SCHOOL(1)
page.content: {MY AVERAGE DAY} Monday morning and the day begins.The register of our names is called in silence to see if we are present. Then mathematics starts,averages, fractions,multiplication,roman numerals,division,percentages etc.Then if we have sparetime we get to the more exciting things.These include,powered cars,sheep made of clay,art-straw work,wire people, spinning and weaving. "Clear away,then you may go out to play"Mrs Graham says.Playtime consists of tailtigs which is a game when someone else tries to tig and theyhold hands and try to tig someone else. Another game is foxes and rabbits,the people who are foxes hide and those who are rabbits find.Whistle goes,playtime ends."English books out write an essay on"Myself."
